update ev_frontend_event
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR},
`time` = #{time,jdbcType=CHAR},
ef_id = #{efId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
duration = #{duration,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
event_num = #{eventNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
event_date = #{eventDate,jdbcType=DATE},
time_interval = #{timeInterval,jdbcType=CHAR},
sponsor = #{sponsor,jdbcType=CHAR},
detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contact_person = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=CHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},
picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talent_id = #{talentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=CHAR},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where fe_id = #{feId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ev_frontend_event set `name` = #{name,jdbcType=CHAR}, `time` = #{time,jdbcType=CHAR}, ef_id = #{efId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, duration = #{duration,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, event_num = #{eventNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, event_date = #{eventDate,jdbcType=DATE}, time_interval = #{timeInterval,jdbcType=CHAR}, sponsor = #{sponsor,jdbcType=CHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_person = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=CHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, picture = #{picture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, talent_id = #{talentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=CHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where fe_id = #{feId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: f.fe_id as feId, `name`, `time`,f.ef_id as efId, f.duration, f.event_num as eventNum, event_date as eventDate,time_interval as timeInterval, f.sponsor, f.detail, f.contact_person as contactPerson, f.phone, f.picture, f.talent_id as talentId, f.open_id as openId, `status`, create_time as createTime, start_time as startTime, end_time as endTime, update_time as updateTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ev_frontend_event f
and f.open_id = #{oid,jdbcType=CHAR}
order by find_in_set(f.`status`,'1,2,3,4,5') asc, update_time desc

SELECT
FROM ev_frontend_event f
and f.`name` like '%' #{name,jdbcType=CHAR} '%' and f.`status` = 1
and f.`status` = 2 and f.`status` = 2 and f.start_time < #{currentTime} and f.end_time >= #{currentTime} and f.`status` = 2 and f.end_time <= #{currentTime} and f.`status` = 3 and f.`status` = 4 and f.`status` = 5
order by find_in_set(f.`status`,'1,2,3,4,5') asc, update_time desc
